Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 129th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1971...
Injured on 5/16/1971 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 7/19/1971 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Drafted in 4th round, 69th overall pick, by Texas in 1975...
Injured on 5/8/1978 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/8/1984 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Pat Zachry (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/12/1985, off Moose Haas (OAK)...
Injured on 7/31/1987 with a Bruised Heel, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/14/1987 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Oakland on 9/20/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/4/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
